name: Yearn CRV
description: yCRV is Yearn Finance's new and improved veCRV wrapper system designed to tokenize the different benefits of Yearn's veCRV position. This system is composed of a base-token called yCRV as well as 3 derivative tokens called activated tokens: st-yCRV, lp-yCRV, and vl-yCRV. st-yCRV yVault receives admin fees and bribes from locked CRV. lp-yCRV Vault is for CRV/yCRV LP tokens, autocompounds emissions and fees. vl-yCRV vault is for voting power on Curve gauge weights.
